00016   type :: source_type
00017 
00018     real(8), allocatable :: E(:)      ! energy range for fission source
00019     real(8)              :: cdf_width ! width of cdf bins from 0 to 1
00020 
00021   end type source_type
00022 
00023   type :: thermal_type
00024 
00025     integer               :: kTsize    ! size of kT vector
00026     integer               :: cdfsize   ! size of cdf
00027     real(8), allocatable  :: kTvec(:)  ! vector of kT values
00028     real(8), allocatable  :: Erat(:,:) ! energy
00029     real(8)               :: cdf_width ! width of cdf interval from 0 to 1 
00030     
00031   end type thermal_type
00032 
00033   type :: iso_type
00034 
00035     real(8)               :: N           ! number density
00036     real(8)               :: A           ! atomic weight
00037     real(8)               :: alpha       ! (A-1)^2/(A+1)^2
00038     real(8)               :: mubar       ! average cosine scattering angle
00039     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_capt(:)  ! capture micro xs
00040     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_scat(:)  ! scattering micro xs
00041     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_fiss(:)  ! fission micro xs
00042     character(len=255)    :: name        ! name of isotope
00043 
00044     logical               :: thermal     ! thermal scatterer
00045     type(thermal_type)    :: thermal_lib ! thermal library
00046 
00047   end type iso_type
00048 
00049   type, public ::  material_type
00050 
00051     type(source_type)           :: source        ! the source of neutrons
00052     type(iso_type), allocatable :: isotopes(:)   ! 1-D array of isotopes in mat
00053     integer                     :: nisotopes     ! number of isotopes in mat
00054     integer                     :: curr_iso      ! the current isotope
00055     integer                     :: npts          ! number of points in energy
00056     real(8)                     :: E_width       ! width of energy interval
00057     real(8)                     :: E_min         ! min energy
00058     real(8)                     :: E_max         ! max energy
00059     real(8)                     :: vol           ! volume of region
00060     real(8), allocatable        :: totalxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic tot xs
00061     real(8), allocatable        :: scattxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic scat xs
00062     real(8), allocatable        :: absorxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic abs xs
00063     real(8), allocatable        :: captuxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic capt xs
00064     real(8), allocatable        :: fissixs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic fiss xs
00065     real(8), allocatable        :: transxs(:,:)  ! array of macro transport xs
00066 
00067   end type material_type

00071 !===============================================================================
00072 ! SET_UP_MATERIALS
00075 
00076   subroutine setup_material(this,emin,emax,nisotopes,vol)
00077 
00078     ! formal variables
00079     type(material_type) :: this      ! a material
00080     real(8)             :: emin      ! minimum energy to consider
00081     real(8)             :: emax      ! maximum energy to consider
00082     real(8)             :: vol       ! volume of material
00083     integer             :: nisotopes ! number of isotopes
00084 
00085     ! set number of isotopes
00086     this%nisotopes = nisotopes
00087 
00088     ! set volume
00089     this%vol = vol
00090 
00091     ! allocate isotopes array
00092     if (.not. allocated(this%isotopes)) allocate(this%isotopes(this%nisotopes))
00093 
00094     ! set up current isotope index
00095     this%curr_iso = 1
00096 
00097     ! set energy bounds
00098     this%E_min = emin
00099     this%E_max = emax
00100 
00101   end subroutine setup_material
00102 
00103 !===============================================================================
00104 ! LOAD_ISOTOPE
00107 
00108   subroutine load_isotope(this,N,A,path,thermal,name)
00109 
00110     use hdf5
00111 
00112     ! formal variables
00113     type(material_type),target :: this    ! a material
00114     real(8)                    :: N       ! number density
00115     real(8)                    :: A       ! atomic weight
00116     character(len=255)         :: path    ! path to isotope
00117     character(len=255)         :: name    ! name of isotope
00118     logical                    :: thermal ! contains a thermal lib
00119 
00120     ! local variables
00121     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00122     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00123     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00124     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00125     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(2) :: dim2         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00126     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size
00127     type(thermal_type), pointer    :: therm
00128 
00129     ! display to user
00130     write(*,*) 'Loading isotope: ',trim(name)
00131 
00132     ! set parameters
00133     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%N = N
00134     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%A = A
00135     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%mubar = 2._8/(3._8*A) 
00136     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%alpha = ((A-1._8)/(A+1._8))**2 
00137     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal = thermal
00138     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%name = name
00139 
00140     ! open up hdf5 file
00141     call h5fopen_f(trim(path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00142 
00143     ! read size of vector
00144     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00145     dim1 = (/1/)
00146     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00147     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00148 
00149     ! allocate all xs vectors
00150     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat))                  &
00151    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat(vecsize))
00152     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt))                  &
00153    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt(vecsize))
00154     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss))                  &
00155    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss(vecsize))
00156 
00157 
00158     ! keep the size
00159     this%npts = vecsize
00160 
00161     ! zero out xs vectors
00162     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat = 0.0_8
00163     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt = 0.0_8
00164     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss = 0.0_8
00165 
00166     ! read in xs
00167     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_scat",dataset_id,error)
00168     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00169     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00170    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat,dim1,error)
00171     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00172     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_capt",dataset_id,error)
00173     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00174     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00175    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt,dim1,error)
00176     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00177     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_fiss",dataset_id,error)
00178     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00179     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00180    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss,dim1,error)
00181     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00182 
00183     ! get energy interval width
00184     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E_width",dataset_id,error)
00185     dim1 = (/1/)
00186     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%E_width,dim1,error)
00187     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00188 
00189     ! check for thermal scattering kernel and load that
00190     if (this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal) then
00191 
00192       ! set pointer
00193       therm => this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal_lib
00194 
00195       ! load sizes
00196       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kTsize",dataset_id,error)
00197       dim1 = (/1/)
00198       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%kTsize,dim1,error)
00199       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00200       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdfsize",dataset_id,error)
00201       dim1 = (/1/)
00202       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%cdfsize,dim1,error)
00203       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00204 
00205       ! read in cdf width
00206       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00207       dim1 = (/1/)
00208       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%cdf_width,dim1,error)
00209       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00210 
00211       ! preallocate vectors
00212       if(.not.allocated(therm%kTvec)) allocate(therm%kTvec(therm%kTsize))
00213       if(.not.allocated(therm%Erat)) allocate(therm%Erat(therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize))
00214 
00215       ! read in vectors
00216       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kT",dataset_id,error)
00217       dim1 = (/therm%kTsize/)
00218       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%kTvec,dim1,error)
00219       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00220       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/Erat",dataset_id,error)
00221       dim2 = (/therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize/)
00222       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%Erat,dim2,error)
00223       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00224 
00225     end if
00226 
00227     ! close hdf5 file
00228     call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00229 
00230     ! increment isotope counter
00231     this%curr_iso = this%curr_iso + 1
00232 
00233   end subroutine load_isotope
00234 
00235 !===============================================================================
00236 ! LOAD_SOURCE
00239 
00240   subroutine load_source(this,source_type,source_path)
00241 
00242     use hdf5 
00243 
00244     ! formal variables
00245     type(material_type) :: this        ! a material
00246     integer             :: source_type ! 0 - fixed, 1 - fission
00247     character(len=255)  :: source_path ! path to source file
00248 
00249     ! local variables
00250     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00251     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00252     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00253     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00254     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size for fission
00255 
00256 
00257     ! check for fission source
00258     if (source_type == 1) then
00259 
00260       ! open the fission source file
00261       call h5fopen_f(trim(source_path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00262 
00263       ! open dataset and read in vector size
00264       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00265       dim1 = (/1/)
00266       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00267       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00268 
00269       ! open dataset and read in width of cdf interval
00270       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00271       dim1 = (/1/)
00272       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%cdf_width,dim1,  &
00273      &               error)
00274       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00275 
00276       ! preallocate vectors in source object
00277       if(.not.allocated(this%source%E)) allocate(this%source%E(vecsize))
00278 
00279       ! open dataset and read in energy vector
00280       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E",dataset_id,error)
00281       dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00282       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%E,dim1,error)
00283       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00284 
00285       ! close the file
00286       call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00287 
00288     end if
00289 
00290   end subroutine load_source
00291 
00292 !===============================================================================
00293 ! COMPUTE_MACROXS
00296 
00297   subroutine compute_macroxs(this)
00298 
00299     ! formal variables
00300     type(material_type),target :: this ! a material
00301 
00302     ! local variables
00303     integer                 :: i   ! loop counter
00304     type(iso_type), pointer :: iso ! pointer to current isotope
00305 
00306     ! allocate xs arrays
00307     if (.not.allocated(this%totalxs))                                          &
00308    &                            allocate(this%totalxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00309     if (.not.allocated(this%scattxs))                                          &
00310    &                            allocate(this%scattxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00311     if (.not.allocated(this%absorxs))                                          &
00312    &                            allocate(this%absorxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00313     if (.not.allocated(this%captuxs))                                          &
00314    &                            allocate(this%captuxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00315     if (.not.allocated(this%fissixs))                                          &
00316    &                            allocate(this%fissixs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00317     if (.not.allocated(this%transxs))                                          &
00318    &                            allocate(this%transxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00319 
00320     ! zero out total xs
00321     this%totalxs = 0.0_8
00322 
00323     ! begin loop over isotopes
00324     do i = 1,this%nisotopes
00325 
00326       ! set pointer to isotope
00327       iso => this%isotopes(i)
00328 
00329       ! multiply microscopic cross section by number density and append
00330       this%captuxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt)
00331       this%fissixs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_fiss)
00332       this%scattxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_scat)
00333       this%absorxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt + iso%xs_fiss)
00334       this%totalxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt + iso%xs_fiss + iso%xs_scat)
00335       this%transxs(:,i) = this%totalxs(:,i) - iso%mubar*this%scattxs(:,i)
00336 
00337     end do
00338 
00339   end subroutine compute_macroxs
00340 
00341 !===============================================================================
00342 ! DEALLOCATE_MATERIAL
00345 
00346   subroutine deallocate_material(this)
00347 
00348     ! formal variables
00349     type(material_type) :: this ! a material
00350 
00351     ! local variables
00352     integer :: i ! loop counter
00353 
00354     ! deallocate source information
00355     if (allocated(this%source%E)) deallocate(this%source%E)
00356 
00357     ! begin loop over isotopes for deallocation
00358     do i = 1,this%nisotopes
00359 
00360       ! deallocate thermal library
00361       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%kTvec)) deallocate            &
00362      &             (this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%kTvec)
00363       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%Erat)) deallocate             &
00364      &             (this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%Erat)
00365 
00366       ! deallocate xs
00367       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_scat)) deallocate                      &
00368      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_scat)
00369       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_capt)) deallocate                      &
00370      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_capt)
00371       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_fiss)) deallocate                      &
00372      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_fiss)
00373     end do
00374 
00375     ! deallocate isotopes
00376     if (allocated(this%isotopes)) deallocate(this%isotopes) 
00377 
00378     ! deallocate macro xs
00379     if (allocated(this%totalxs)) deallocate(this%totalxs)
00380     if (allocated(this%scattxs)) deallocate(this%scattxs)
00381     if (allocated(this%absorxs)) deallocate(this%absorxs)
00382     if (allocated(this%captuxs)) deallocate(this%captuxs)
00383     if (allocated(this%fissixs)) deallocate(this%fissixs)
00384     if (allocated(this%transxs)) deallocate(this%transxs)
00385 
00386   end subroutine deallocate_material
00387 
00388 end module materials
